introduce.title: What is ChatGPT Caricature?
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: ChatGPT Caricature is the viral AI art trend sweeping social media in 2026. Users upload a selfie and receive a playful, exaggerated cartoon portrait that highlights their facial features, profession, and personality. Creating a caricature on ChatGPT used to require a Plus subscription and careful prompting — our dedicated ChatGPT caricature generator makes it effortless. Simply upload a photo, choose a style, and create a caricature of me in seconds.

image.alt: ChatGPT Caricature of me example — AI-generated cartoon portrait from your selfie

faq.title: ChatGPT Caricature FAQ
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating ChatGPT Caricature portraits.

items.question: What is a ChatGPT Caricature?
items.answer: A ChatGPT Caricature is a viral AI art trend from 2026 where advanced AI models transform a selfie into a fun, exaggerated cartoon portrait. The trend started when users asked ChatGPT to create playful caricatures based on their photos and personal details. Our dedicated AI caricature generator takes this concept further — you get professional-quality caricature portraits from your photos without needing a ChatGPT Plus subscription.

items.question: How does the AI caricature generator work?
items.answer: Upload a clear face photo, select one of our 9 caricature styles (Classic, Pro-Roast, 3D Cartoon, Comic, Chibi, Pop Art, Action Figure, Claymation, or South Park), optionally add your job title or hobbies, and click Create. Our AI analyzes your facial features — structure, expression, and proportions — then generates a personalized cartoon portrait in seconds.

items.question: What photo works best for AI caricatures?
items.answer: A clear, well-lit face photo produces the best results. Front-facing portraits with even lighting give the most accurate and fun caricature output. Avoid group photos, heavy filters, sunglasses, or images where the face is partially obscured.

items.question: How much does it cost to create a caricature?
items.answer: Each caricature costs 20 credits. Start with our Credits Pack at $4.9 for 400 credits (20 caricatures), or subscribe to the monthly plan at $9.9/month for 500 credits (25 caricatures per month). Both options include full high-resolution downloads.

items.question: Can I use my caricature for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! You own the rights to your generated caricature portraits. Use them freely for social media profiles, business cards, team pages, gifts, merchandise, marketing materials, and more.

items.question: What caricature styles are available?
items.answer: We offer 9 distinct styles: Classic Caricature (traditional big-head with exaggerated features), Pro-Roast Job (profession-themed with work props), 3D Cartoon (Pixar/Disney-inspired), Comic Style (superhero comic book look), Chibi (cute anime proportions), Pop Art (bold colors inspired by Andy Warhol), Action Figure (collectible toy packaging), Claymation (Wallace & Gromit texture), and TV Satire - South Park (paper cutout).

items.question: How is this different from using ChatGPT directly?
items.answer: Creating a caricature on ChatGPT directly requires a paid subscription and careful prompt engineering. Our tool is purpose-built for ChatGPT caricature creation — no subscription needed, no daily image limits, and no guessing with prompts. We also offer 9 specialized caricature styles (including viral trends like Action Figure and South Park), real face recognition from your uploaded photo, and consistent high-quality results every time.

items.question: Is my photo data safe and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your uploaded photos are processed securely and are not stored permanently after generation. Unlike the ChatGPT caricature trend that relies on your chat history, our tool only uses the photo you upload — no personal data mining.

items.question: Can I create a 'me and my job' caricature?
items.answer: Yes! The Job Caricature style is designed exactly for the viral 'me and my job' trend. Enter your profession and the AI will surround your cartoon portrait with relevant tools, props, and workplace elements that represent your career.

items.question: How do I create a ChatGPT caricature of me?
items.answer: Creating a ChatGPT caricature of me is simple: upload a clear selfie, pick one of 9 AI caricature styles, and your personalized cartoon portrait is ready in seconds. Unlike making a caricature on ChatGPT directly, our dedicated tool needs no subscription, no prompt engineering, and delivers consistent, high-quality caricature portraits every time.
